newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Soldier dies two years after Islamic Jihad bombing.
newsitem.headline: Soldier dies two years after Islamic Jihad bombing.

text.p: An Israeli soldier wounded in a suicide bombing by the militant Islamic Jihad group died on Monday nearly two years after the attack, an army spokesman said.
"Corporal Assaf Ben-Or, 20, from Kiryat Bialik, injured in the attack at Beit Lid on January 22, 1995, died today of his wounds," the spokesman said.

His death raised to 22 the number of people killed in the attack by the group which opposes Israel-PLO peace deals. Islamic Jihad and the larger Hamas group have killed scores of Israelis in suicide bombings since the breakthrough Israel-PLO peace deal in 1993.
